Extract all vertex attributes as a data frame.

Source: R/dataframe.R
vrt_as_df.Rd

Extract all vertex attributes as a data frame.

vrt_as_df(x)

# S3 method for igraph
vrt_as_df(x)

# S3 method for network
vrt_as_df(x)

Arguments

x

An igraph, network, or tbl_graph.

Examples

library(snatools)

crisis_in_cloister %>%
  vrt_as_df()
#> [90m# A tibble: 25 x 3[39m
#>    .vrt_id .vrt_name   cloisterville
#>      [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m       [3m[90m<lgl>[39m[23m        
#> [90m 1[39m       1 Leo         TRUE         
#> [90m 2[39m       2 Arsenius    TRUE         
#> [90m 3[39m       3 Bruno       TRUE         
#> [90m 4[39m       4 Thomas      TRUE         
#> [90m 5[39m       5 Bartholomew TRUE         
#> [90m 6[39m       6 John Bosco  FALSE        
#> [90m 7[39m       7 Gregory     FALSE        
#> [90m 8[39m       8 Basil       FALSE        
#> [90m 9[39m       9 Martin      TRUE         
#> [90m10[39m      10 Peter       TRUE         
#> [90m# ... with 15 more rows[39m
florence %>%
  vrt_as_df()
#> [90m# A tibble: 16 x 4[39m
#>    .vrt_id .vrt_name    wealth priorate_seats
#>      [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m [3m[90m<chr>[39m[23m         [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m          [3m[90m<int>[39m[23m
#> [90m 1[39m       1 Acciaiuoli       10             53
#> [90m 2[39m       2 Albizzi          36             65
#> [90m 3[39m       3 Barbadori        55             [31mNA[39m
#> [90m 4[39m       4 Bischeri         44             12
#> [90m 5[39m       5 Castellani       20             22
#> [90m 6[39m       6 Ginori           32             [31mNA[39m
#> [90m 7[39m       7 Guadagni          8             21
#> [90m 8[39m       8 Lamberteschi     42              0
#> [90m 9[39m       9 Medici          103             53
